# tools

## <ApiType type="Class" slug="base-tool" symbolName="BaseTool" /> BaseTool

Tool instance with arguments provided by an LLM.

When an LLM uses a tool during a call, a Tool instance is created with the specific
arguments provided by the LLM.

**Bases:**

## <ApiType type="Class" slug="base-tool-def" symbolName="BaseToolDef" /> BaseToolDef

Base class defining a tool that can be used by LLMs.

A ToolDef represents a function that can be called by an LLM during a call.
It includes metadata like name, description, and parameter schema.

This class is not instantiated directly but created by the `@tool()` decorator.

**Bases:** 
<TypeLink type={{"type_str": "Generic[P, R]", "description": null, "kind": "generic", "base_type": {"type_str": "Generic", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "Generic", "doc_url": "https://docs.python.org/3/library/typing.html#typing.Generic"}, "parameters": [{"type_str": "P", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "P", "doc_url": null}, {"type_str": "R", "description": null, "kind": "simple", "symbol_name": "R", "doc_url": null}], "doc_url": null}} />

## <ApiType type="Function" slug="mirascope-llm-tools-context_tool_def--context-tool-def-defines" symbolName="defines" /> defines

Check if this ToolDef matches a specific Tool instance.

This method is used to ensure that the ToolDef was created from a specific
function, allowing for type-safe access to the return value when calling
the tool.

## <ApiType type="Function" slug="tool_fn" symbolName="tool" /> tool

Decorator that turns a function into a tool definition.

This decorator creates a `ToolDef` that can be used with `llm.call`.
The function's name, docstring, and type hints are used to generate the
tool's metadata.

Example:

    ```python
    from mirascope import llm

    @llm.tool()
    def available_books() -> list[str]:
        """Returns the list of available books."""
        return ["The Name of the Wind"]
    ```

<ParametersTable
  parameters={[
  {
    "name": "__fn",
    "type_info": {
      "type_str": "Callable[P, R] | None",
      "description": null,
      "kind": "union",
      "base_type": {
        "type_str": "Union",
        "description": null,
        "kind": "simple",
        "symbol_name": "Union",
        "doc_url": "https://docs.python.org/3/library/typing.html#typing.Union"
      },
      "parameters": [
        {
          "type_str": "Callable[P, R]",
          "description": null,
          "kind": "callable",
          "base_type": {
            "type_str": "Callable",
            "description": null,
            "kind": "simple",
            "symbol_name": "Callable",
            "doc_url": "https://docs.python.org/3/library/typing.html#typing.Callable"
          },
          "parameters": [
            {
              "type_str": "P",
              "description": null,
              "kind": "simple",

      "doc_url": null

    "default": "None"
